Reviews.Title: “Won't be coming back”
Reviews.Author: Normsie
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights the end of December but won't be coming back. The room was dingy and outdated, the heater was loud, and the sink had large cracks with black stains and needs to be replaced. The breakfast room is crowded and filled with surplus TV's on one end. There were donuts one day, and the coffee and juice was ok.

Reviews.Title: “Dont waste your money”
Reviews.Author: Tito_allawishus
Reviews.Content: I read other reviews and decided to try anyway DONT wifi is awful at best. The room had mold,holes in the cielings, walls and stains on couch and floor. Two sinks only one with running water. Bathtub wouldnt hold water and constantly drained. The hotel offers no refunds or we would have stayed somewhere else. We were also charged over our booking price at check in. And remember this NO REFUNDS

Reviews.Title: “Great Hospitality And Location”
Reviews.Author: jerry t
Reviews.Content: Me and my friends goes to Branson every year for car show. We always stay at the RIA. It's on strip 76. we were there for 6 nights. We could not have received any better hospitality than we received at the Ria motor Inn. The owners and staff made us feel at home and their hospitality was the best. Doughnuts juice coffee serial and milk every morning. Along with great advice on getting around Branson, and how to get discounts on tickets, was greatly appreciated. The owners treated us just like family. I would recommend the Ria motor Inn as the best place to stay in Branson, clean easy to enter and leave the parking lot, large pool, great hospitality and best off all reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “i like to stay there again”
Reviews.Author: therock s
Reviews.Content: we were in room 107. room was clean and comfortable beds in it. they had breakfast in the morning it was donut, juice, coffie, serial, milk. we'd enjoy in branson. staff were so nice and friendl. they help me to get in room. value of money to stay at the ria.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: efkazz
Reviews.Content: Oh my! I will NEVER stay here again! The rooms are smelly, chair was stained and the office person won't even put his cell phone down to help. Wifi DID NOT WORK and the bfast was donuts only. It was quiet though for being on the strip. Hotel needs knew carpet, beds, furniture, etc...

Reviews.Title: “Lesson learned the hard way - read reviews before you stay here!”
Reviews.Author: happymolly
Reviews.Content: We were given the wrong room at check in even though we had a pre-booked confirmation, we had to take the room available which was not the preference that we reserved and paid for. Screen hanging off back room of the family suite window. Small chidren could easily fall out. Coffee and supplies are extremely minimal. Bed had broken spring. Helicopter ride next door makes a lot of noise if you plan on spending anytime in the room (napping etc.) Walls are extremely thin between floors so you hear the guests above you quite well. It is close to lots of things on the strip and the housekeeper was very friendly, but overall I wouldn't pay my money to stay here again. Just didn't seem very clean or organized.

Reviews.Title: “Big Rooms, Great Location, Great Value. I will be back.”
Reviews.Author: psychovideo
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Ria June 28th - July 1st 2011. We were in a family suite and had plenty of room for the whole family. They are in a great location right in the middle of everything. The staff was friendly and very accommodating. I have paid much more for much less. I will definitely stay at the Ria the next time I take my family to Branson. 5 stars from me.

Reviews.Title: “Wifi, breakfast, swimming pool”
Reviews.Author: inks11
Reviews.Content: They say they have free wifi. That is a lie, you can't connect to it. They say it is netgear and it will never show. The rooms are not what they say there and their free beakfast are dounuts and coffee and u have to eat where they have them at and can't take to room. The swimming pool was not even filled.

Reviews.Title: “horrible room we where in & over priced”
Reviews.Author: redhairman
Reviews.Content: We checked in & had to pay $111 for two nights. Once we got in the room. The A/C was unplugged. I found on knob missing. had to pull it off to use for both switches. Very frustating. The bathroom door looked like it was old & cheap. The bathtub had a handle missing which exposed two holes in the bathtub. When it was time to go to sleep we pulled back the sheets & found a urine stain on the inside of the sheet. When we checked out we told the man behind the desk. He rolled his eyes like he didnt care about it. I will never stay in that motel again.

HotelInfo.Name: Ria Motor Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3325 Highway 76 West, Branson, MO 65616
